titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain capers preserved by vinegar or acetic acid.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 9/7/2004--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2007, the duty on certain capers preserved by vinegar or acetic acid.
